titleStmt.title: His Majesties two letters one to the vice-chancellour and convocation of the Vniversity of Oxford : the other to the high sheriff of the county and to the major of the city of Oxford : published for the satisfying of all His Majesties loving subjects and for the cleering of His Majesties royall resolution : as well in the carefull preservation of the True Protestant religion, the just priviledges of Parliament the laws of the land, and the liberty of the subject : as also in the just protection of all those his loving subjects who shall at any time be called in question for their dutifull allegiance and loyalty tendred to His Majesty.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
